org.hps.readout.ecal

Class EcalReadoutDriver<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.readout.ecal.TriggerableDriver
        • org.hps.readout.ecal.EcalReadoutDriver<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FADCEcalReadoutDriver, SimpleEcalReadoutDriver, TimeEvolutionEcalReadoutDriver

    public abstract class EcalReadoutDriver<T>
extends TriggerableDriver
    Performs readout of ECal hits.
